description: Manage NetApp Storage Array Host Groups

new_name.description: specify this when you need to update the name of a host group

ssid.description: The ID of the array to manage (as configured on the web services proxy).

name.description: The name of the host group to manage. Either this or C(id_num) must be supplied.

api_password.description: The password to authenticate with the SANtricity WebServices Proxy or embedded REST API.

hosts:.description: a list of host names/labels to add to the group

state.description: Whether the specified host group should exist or not.

api_username.description: The username to authenticate with the SANtricity WebServices Proxy or embedded REST API.

id.description: The id number of the host group to manage. Either this or C(name) must be supplied.

api_url.description: The url to the SANtricity WebServices Proxy or embedded REST API.
